testSteps.description: Given the user navigates on the web page
When The user searches for Alexa
And The user navigates to the second page
And The user selects the third item
Then User will be able to add tje item to the cart

userStory.storyName: As a Customer when I search for Alexa, I want to see if the third option on the second page is available for
userStory.narrative: purchase and can be added to the cart.
